plot: Saturday morning dance contest where kids perform for judges and viewers are encouraged to participate through on-screen cues. Based on the video game "Dance Dance Revolution".
plot_en: Saturday morning dance contest where kids perform for judges and viewers are encouraged to participate through on-screen cues. Based on the video game "Dance Dance Revolution".
plot_es: Saturday morning dance contest where kids perform for judges and viewers are encouraged to participate through on-screen cues. Based on the video game "Dance Dance Revolution".
title: Dance Revolution
